data.oai_dc:dc: nt123 data matrix partitioned by 1st and 2nd positions - NEXUS

NEXUS file with the concatenated individual orthologous group alignments (406 total), with 40 taxa. This is the nt123 data matrix converted to nexus format, with a block added partitioning by codon position but excluding 3rd positions. Only positions 1 and 2 for each codon were included.
